aboutme.message:
I'm Thomas Bella, a young ($age$) developer from Siegenfeld, Austria.
uDomainFlag is a free service from unterhaltungsbox.com.
If you like this plugin or want to support me, please buy me a coffee ;-)

age.example: My age. I'm born on May 5'th 1994

cache_desc.message: The cache is already $size$ large. You can clear the cache by clicking the following button. Attention! To delete the entire cache, the uDomainFlag will be restarted.

size.example: Size of the cache with extension (eg. Bytes, KB, MB)

description.message: Get additional information about a domain in the omnibar.

domain_unknown.message:
No data could be found for the requested page.
It is probable that this is a local or invalid domain.

donated.message: $count$ persons have spent already a total amount of $amount$ €.

email_not_required.message: If no email is specified, it can not be replied to your message.

error_report_desc.message: Should crash reports be send to the developer automatically? The report of crashes improves the stability and functionality of uDomainFlag.

feedback_thankyou.message: Thank you very much for your support to improve uDomainFlag.

language_please.message: Please give me your feedback in German or English.

local_ressource.message: The requested document was obtained from the local computer.

multi_domain.message: Domain refers to multiple IP addresses.

open_source.message: uDomainFlag is licensed under the GPL license and so open source. You're invited to submit improvements! The source code is always at GitHub » Thomas2500 » uDomainFlag visible. The translations are expandable at uTranslate.

popup_desc.message: As standard an info-box with useful information is shown when you click on the flag. Do you want to open the uDomainFlag website instead?

project_description.message:
This extension shows you the location where the web server from a web page is situated while you visit the page. Also you get shown the IP address and the host name.

During the visit of a page a flag is placed in the address bar of the browser. This flag indicates the server's country of origin that hosts the website.

If you click on the flag you get additional information about the page:
  - Location
  - IP address of the website
  - Hostname of the server
  - Website security by Web of Trust
  - Website traffic analysis by Alexa Rank

The perfect addition for home users and developers.
This allows a quick check whether the requested website really comes from the referred country.


Privacy Policy:
No personal data will be transmitted or stored. It is exclusively a storage accessed data in the user's browser.

restart_desc.message:
Click on the following button to restart uDomainFlag.
When clicking the button the tab will be closed automatically and will be opened after restart.

securitykey_desc.message: The security key serves to protect the uDomainFlag service. Each user gets an own private key. This key must not passed to others in any way.

socialdata_desc.message: Should be shown social information in the info-box like "like" of facebook and "+1" of Google?

updated.message: The extension has been updated from version $last_version$ to version $new_version$.

update_desc.message: Do you want to be informed after an update?

usage_desc.message: Your usage data helps us to improve and ensure the stable operation of uDomainFlag. You can always disable the sending of usage data and switch it on again.

wotmessage0.message: There are no reputations for this site yet.

wotmessage1.message: This website has a very poor reputation.

wotmessage2.message: This website has a poor reputation.

wotmessage3.message: This website has a moderate reputation.

wotmessage4.message: This website has a good reputation.

wotmessage5.message: This website has a very good reputation.
